table.name: ottocrat_quickview
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `ottocrat_quickview` ( `fieldid` int(19) NOT NULL, `related_fieldid` int(19) NOT NULL, `sequence` int(19) NOT NULL, `view` int(19) NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT fk_1_ottocrat_quickview FOREIGN KEY (`fieldid`) REFERENCES `ottocrat_field` (`fieldid`) ON DELETE CASCADE )
